attributes.action: Stop sending money abroad and spend it on the flood victims in britain.
attributes.additional_details: To get the government to understand our country should be looked after first. We pay millions to india and they are one of the richest countries in the world
attributes.background: TO GET THE GOVERNMENT TO DIVERT OVERSEAS FUNDING. GIVE IT TO THE FLOOD VICTIMS AND BUILD BETTER FLOOD DEFENSES TO STOP IT HAPPENING AGAIN  LOOK AFTER OUR OWN FIRST
